name: LinkedPageItemOption
shortdesc: The link options for a linked Page Item.

property.name: isValid
property.shortdesc: Returns true if the object specifier resolves to valid objects.

property.name: parent
property.shortdesc: The parent of the LinkedPageItemOption &#40;a Application, Document, PageItem, HtmlItem, FormField, SignatureField, TextBox, RadioButton, ListBox, ComboBox, CheckBox, MultiStateObject, Button, MediaItem, Sound, Movie, EPSText, SplineItem, Polygon, GraphicLine, Rectangle, Oval, Graphic, ImportedPage, PICT, WMF, PDF, EPS, Image, Group or TextFrame).

property.name: updateLinkWhileSaving
property.shortdesc: If true, the linked Page Item will be updated while saving.

property.name: warnOnUpdateOfEditedPageItem
property.shortdesc: If true, a warning will be shown if the update link operation will override local edits.

property.name: preserveSizeAndShape
property.shortdesc: If true, size and shape edits will be preserved during update.

property.name: preserveAppearance
property.shortdesc: If true, appearance edits will be preserved during update.

property.name: preserveInteractivity
property.shortdesc: If true, interactivity edits will be preserved during update.

property.name: preserveFrameContent
property.shortdesc: If true, frame content edits will be preserved during update.

property.name: preserveOthers
property.shortdesc: If true, text wrap, hyperLinks, text frame options, object export settings will be preserved during update.

property.name: properties
property.shortdesc: A property that allows setting of several properties at the same time.

method.name: toSource
method.shortdesc: Generates a string which, if executed, will return the LinkedPageItemOption.

method.name: getElements
method.shortdesc: Resolves the object specifier, creating an array of object references.

parameter.name: handler
parameter.shortdesc: The event handler. Can accept: File or JavaScript Function.

parameter.name: handler
parameter.shortdesc: The registered event handler. Can accept: File or JavaScript Function.
